named-query.name: Rol.listarRolesUsuario
named-query.query: SELECT ur.rol FROM UsuarioRol ur WHERE ur.usuario.id = ?1

named-query.name: Usuario.buscarUser
named-query.query: SELECT u FROM Usuario u WHERE u.usuario = ?1

named-query.name: Usuario.buscarUserPass
named-query.query: SELECT u FROM Usuario u WHERE u.usuario = ?1 and u.pass=?2

named-query.name: Usuario.roles
named-query.query: SELECT ur.rol FROM UsuarioRol ur WHERE ur.usuario.usuario = ?1

named-query.name: Acceso.buscarRol
named-query.query: SELECT ar.acceso FROM AccesoRol ar WHERE ar.rol=?1

named-query.name: Semestre.buscarSemestres
named-query.query: SELECT s FROM Semestre s where s.anho =?1 and s.periodo =?2

named-query.name: DiaNoLaborable.listarDias
named-query.query: SELECT d FROM DiaNoLaborable d where d.semestre.anho =?1 and d.semestre.periodo =?2
